title: My Dear Marie (Boku no Marie) Full 3 Episodes Series Anime
description:
My Dear Marie (Boku no Marie) Full Series Anime NTSC.

Audio: Japanese 2.0; English 2.0
Subs: English
Ratio: 4:3 NTSC
All 3 episodes, 75 min. total running time


A romantic comedy anime about a nerd and shy teen cientist who builds a cyborg girlfriend in the image of his love interest. Later the cyborg gains self awareness and goes about exploring the outside world, creating embarassing situations for his master. 

From the director of Dirty Pair Flash and Princess Nine.lkvdj
